General.Name: Dongkuk Structures & Construction Company Limited
General.Description: Dongkuk Structures & Construction Company Limited manufactures and sells wind towers in South Korea and internationally. The company also offers steel structures, such as built up, duct and tank, steel bridge, and building and factory steel structures. In addition, it is involved in the development of wind farms; provision of construction services; and generation of wind power. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Pohang, South Korea.

1.Name: Hun-Wook  Joo
1.Title: Exec. Director of Sales and Director
